name: 2nd Generation Java Player
short_description:
Written in true java (unlike the official Scratch Java player), this Scratch (scratch.mit.edu) java player is designed to be faster, more memory efficient, and be able to be used with 15 different mods, with an easy-to-learn and easy-to-use interface to be able to extend it more.

This is developed by the Scratch users SJRCS_011 and GP1 and is in no way endorsed by the Scratch team as of 7/24/12
summary: A second-generation rewrite of Scratch (scratch.mit.edu)'s java player
